energy.zhcn_desc:
§E§H能量币§!（£energy£）是基于能量的通用货币单位，受到所有太空文明的一致认可。你可以通过以下的方式获取更多的能量币：
§Y1.§!在殖民星球上建设§H发电区划§!。
§Y2.§!在富含能源的星球上使用§H工程船§!建设§H开采站§!。
§Y3.§!在§H贸易市场§!出售资源。§!
energy.en_desc:
§E§HEnergy Credits§! (£energy£) is an energy backed currency accepted by all space-faring races. You can gain more energy by:
§Y1.§! Building §HGenerator Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HMining Stations§! around energy rich planets or stars.
§Y3.§! Selling resources on the §HMarket§!.§!

minerals.zhcn_desc:
§E§H矿物§!（£minerals£）是对用于建造飞船、太空站、星际建筑的各种基础材料的统称。你可以通过以下的方式获取更多的矿物：
§Y1.§!在殖民星球上建设§H采矿区划§!。
§Y2.§!在富含矿物的星球上使用§H工程船§!建设§H开采站§!。
§Y3.§!从§H贸易市场§!购入。§!
minerals.en_desc:
§E§HMinerals§! (£minerals£) is a collective term for the basic resources we need to construct ships, stations and planetary buildings. We can gain more by:
§Y1.§! Building §HMining Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.
§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HMining Stations§! around mineral rich planets or asteroids.
§Y3.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!

food.zhcn_desc: §E§H食物§!（£food£）表示了维持£pop£§H人口§!增长的各种必要营养物质。以下方式可获得更多食物：\n§Y1.§!在已殖民的星球上建造§H农业区划§!。\n§Y2.§!在§H市场§!进行购买。§!
food.en_desc: §E§HFood§! (£food£) represents the various nutrients required to sustain and grow £pop£ §HPops§!. You can gain more by:\n§Y1.§! Building §HAgriculture Districts§! on the surface of colonized planets.\n§Y2.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!

physics_research.zhcn_desc: §E§H物理研究§!（£physics£）用于研究新科技。以下方式可以增加产出：\n§Y1.§!在我们的殖民地中建造£building£ §H研究实验室§!。\n§Y2.§!使用§H工程船§!在某些行星或恒星附近建造§H研究站§!。§!
physics_research.en_desc: §E§HPhysics Research§! (£physics£) is used to research new technologies. We can increase our output by: \n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HResearch Labs§! buildings on our colonies. \n§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HResearch Stations§! around certain planets or stars.§!

society_research.zhcn_desc: §E§H社会研究§!（£society£）用于研究新科技。以下方式可以增加产出：\n§Y1.§!在我们的殖民地中建造£building£ §H研究实验室§!。\n§Y2.§!使用§H工程船§!在某些行星或恒星附近建造§H研究站§!。§!
society_research.en_desc: §E§HSociety Research§! (£society£) is used to research new technologies. We can increase our output by: \n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HResearch Labs§! buildings on our colonies.\n§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HResearch Stations§! around certain planets or stars.§!

engineering_research.zhcn_desc: §E§H工程研究§!（£engineering£）用于研究新科技。以下方式可以增加产出：\n§Y1.§!在我们的殖民地中建造£building£ §H研究实验室§!。\n§Y2.§!使用§H工程船§!在某些行星或恒星附近建造§H研究站§!。§!
engineering_research.en_desc: §E§HEngineering Research§! (£engineering£) is used to research new technologies. We can increase our output by: \n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HResearch Labs§! buildings on our colonies.\n§Y2.§! Using §HConstruction Ships§! to build §HResearch Stations§! around certain planets or stars.§!

influence.zhcn_desc: §E§H影响力§!（£influence£）代表了政治影响力，可用于许多方面，如颁布§H法令§!、制造§H宣称§!、建造§H哨站§!以及处理§H派系§!等。其生成速度在游戏流程中基本是固定的，不过可以通过以下方法提高：\n§Y1.§!在我们国内争取§H派系§!的支持。\n§Y2.§!宣布其他帝国为你的§H宿敌§!。§!
influence.en_desc: §E§HInfluence§! (£influence£) represents political clout, and is used for many things, like enacting §HEdicts§!, making §HClaims§!, building §HOutposts§! and dealing with §HFactions§!. The gain rate remains fairly constant throughout the game, but can be increased by:\n§Y1.§! Winning the support of §HFactions§! in our empire.\n§Y2.§! Declaring other empires your §HRivals§!.§!

unity.zhcn_desc: §E§H凝聚力§!（ £unity£ ）可以用来解锁新的§H传统§!。你可以建设建筑提高凝聚力产出： £building£ §H先驱者纪念碑§!或其他可以提供工作岗位以提升凝聚力产出的建筑。§!
unity.en_desc: §E§HUnity§! (£unity£) is used to unlock new §HTraditions§!. We can increase our output by building an £building£ §HAutochthon Monument§! or other buildings that provide jobs which produce Unity.§!

alloys.zhcn_desc: §E§H合金§!（£alloys£）是高级资源，一般用于军事领域，可用来生产§H舰船§!和§H恒星基地§!。可通过以下方式获取更多的合金：\n§Y1.§!在已殖民星球的地表建设£building£ §H合金铸造厂§!建筑。\n§Y2.§!在§H贸易市场§!购买。§!
alloys.en_desc: §E§HAlloys§! (£alloys£) are advanced resources with a military application, which we need to construct §HShips§! and §HStarbases§!. We can gain more by:\n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HAlloy Foundries§! buildings on the surface of colonized planets.\n§Y2.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!

consumer_goods.zhcn_desc: §E§H消费品§!（£consumer_goods£）是高级资源，象征着可以提高£pop£§H人口§!的生活质量的科技产品和奢侈品，同时也是脑力劳动£job£§H职业§!诸如£job_researcher£ §H研究§!所不可或缺的资源。你可以通过以下的方式获取更多的消费品：\n§Y1.§!在殖民星球表面上建设£building£ §H民用工业§!建筑。\n§Y2.§!在§H贸易市场§!添购消费品。§!
consumer_goods.en_desc: §E§HConsumer Goods§! (£consumer_goods£) is an advanced resource that represents the various gadgets, luxuries and goods necessary to give your £pop£ §HPops§! a good life and to perform intellectual £job£ §HJobs§! such as £job_researcher£ §HResearch§!. You can gain more by:\n§Y1.§! Building £building£ §HCivilian Industries§! buildings the surface of colonized planets.\n§Y2.§! Buying more on the §HMarket§!.§!

volatile_motes.zhcn_desc: 这些超自然粒子蕴含有惊人的能量，可以被精炼为能源或者用作燃料和炸药。
volatile_motes.en_desc: These preternatural particles contain a tremendous amount of energy which could be exploited in energy production, as fuel or even as explosives.

exotic_gases.zhcn_desc: 罕见的异星天然气拥有各种用途，主要是用来为高级能量武器和能量力场提供能源。部分也用作舰船燃料或消遣性毒品。
exotic_gases.en_desc: Rare and exotic gases with a variety of different uses, particularly in the operation of advanced energy-based weaponry and force fields. Some of the gases can also be used as starship fuel or even as recreational drugs.

rare_crystals.zhcn_desc: 这些水晶拥有独特的属性，非常适合用来凝聚和集中激光束，同时也是制作大部分高级电子器材的关键材料。部分文化也视之为装饰物。
rare_crystals.en_desc: These crystals have properties that make them extremely effective at focusing laser beams, and they are also a critical component in most advanced electronics. In addition, many cultures treasure them as decorations and adornments.

sr_living_metal.zhcn_desc: 该无机金属有着通常生命体才具备的特征。会自动恢复到其被塑造好的形态。
sr_living_metal.en_desc: This inorganic metal shows characteristics usually seen only in biological life forms. It will always attempt to regenerate back into the shape it was stabilized into.

sr_zro.zhcn_desc: 一种在异星粒子中存在的极其稀有的气溶胶，随着陨石撞击被一起发现。不过其真正的来源依然是个未解之谜。若拥有灵能天赋的人将其摄入体内，泽珞将会极大的提高灵能力量（并可能导致成瘾）。
sr_zro.en_desc: An extremely rare aerosol of exotic particles. It has been deposited on a number of worlds through meteor impacts, but its true origin is a mystery. If ingested by psionically-gifted individuals, zro acts as a very potent (and addictive) drug that enhances PSI abilities.

sr_dark_matter.zhcn_desc: 这种神秘物质具有许多似乎可以打破所谓自然法则的性质。该物质仅在黑洞周围或部分星云附近才能达到可供开采的浓度。
sr_dark_matter.en_desc: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy several natural laws. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.

nanites.zhcn_desc: 简单而高效的纳米致动器，可以执行纳米水平的复杂操作和实验。
nanites.en_desc: Simple but powerful nanoactuators, allowing for complex manipulations and experiments of mesoscopic scales.

minor_artifacts.zhcn_desc: 稀有文物（ £minor_artifacts£ ）代表了我们从古代文明中找到的晦涩技术和某些几近遗忘的传说，我们的科学仅能解读其中的一部分。它们比遗珍要常见，并可以被消耗以产生多种帝国范围的效果。
minor_artifacts.en_desc: Minor artifacts ( £minor_artifacts£ ) represent obscure technology and half-forgotten lore recovered from archaic civilizations, only partially understood by our own science. They are more common than Relics, and can be spent to enact various empire-wide effects.
